Sentencas: Sr1-xCexMnO3 (SCM, x = 0.1, 02, 03) materials synthesized through the EDTA citrate complexing process show a single perovskite structure, and the refined lattice volume increases with the concentration of Ce ions.
Titulo: Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: An increase in the Mn3+ concentration with increasing Ce doping was confirmed by Mn L-3,L-2-edge analysis, and we observe an expansion of the lattice volume due to the larger ionic radii of Mn3+, as compared to that of Mn4+.
Titulo: Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The change in the O K-edge caused by increasing Ce content presented an increase in the binding force of the oxygen ions.
Titulo: Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We hypothesize that the decrease in oxygen vacancy concentration caused by the increase in the oxygen binding force impedes the oxygen ion transfer process, which causes an increase in the polarization resistance (Rp) with the increasing concentration of Ce ions in the SCM system.
Titulo: Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Rp value of Sr1-xCexMnO3/Sm0.2Ce0.8O2 (SCM/SDC) composite cathodes was lower than that of pure SCM cathodes at the measured temperature, especially the Rp value of SCM10/SDC (0.88 cm(2) at 800 degrees C), which is about seven times lower than that of SCM10 at the same temperature.
Titulo: Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Polarization resistance and composite cathode of Ce doped SrMnO3 system for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
